nodes.text: A spaceport was located in the city of Raxulon on the planet Raxus Secundus, capital of the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During the Clone Wars, Galactic Republic Senator Padmé Amidala and Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano rode aboard a cruiser which docked at the spaceport, where they met with Amidala's old friend, Separatist Senator Mina Bonteri.
The spaceport appeared in "Heroes on Both Sides," the tenth episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' third season, which aired on November 19, 2010.
